CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y     apt-transport-https     ca-certificates     curl     gnupg     git     python-pip     python2.7     python2.7-dev     build-essential     --no-install-recommends
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -sSL https://dl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | apt-key add -     && echo "deb [arch=amd64] https://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-chrome.list
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl https://deb.nodesource.com/node_11.x/pool/main/n/nodejs/nodejs_11.9.0-1nodesource1_amd64.deb > node.deb  && dpkg -i node.deb  && rm node.deb
Commands.Name: run
